title: Requests: incorrect user in 'submitted by' field

response.title: Requests: incorrect user in 'submitted by' field
response.description:
Employee (who the request is FOR):
  - ID: RW1wbG95ZWU6fVeDVRyUckKW7P+yBbkatQ==
  - Display Name: "Lehner G."

  Submitter (who CREATED the request):

findings.incorrect_implementation: formatSubmittedBy using employee field instead of submitter field
findings.graphql_schema_confirmed: Request type has submitter field at line 300 in schema
findings.graphql_fragment_missing: REQUEST_DETAILS_FRAGMENT does not fetch submitter field
findings.frontend_component: request-details.tsx line 44-46 displays Submitted By using formatSubmittedBy
findings.solution: Add submitter field to REQUEST_DETAILS_FRAGMENT and update formatSubmittedBy helper
